journal-meta.journal-title: Journal of the American Psychoanalytic Association

body.p: Barbara Almond, Training and Supervising Analyst and faculty, San Francisco Center for Psychoanalysis; Admissions Committee Chair and faculty, Palo Alto Psychoanalytic Psychotherapy Training Program; Voluntary Clinical Assistant Professor Emerita, Department of Psychiatry, Stanford University Medical Center.

Kenneth Eisold, past president, International Society for the Psychoana-lytic Study of Organizations; former director, Organizational Program at the William Alanson White Institute; Fellow, the A.K. Rice Institute.
Robert N. Emde, Emeritus Professor of Psychiatry and Faculty of the Denver Institute for Psychoanalysis, University of Colorado School of Medicine.
Jane V. Kite, Training and Supervising Analyst, PINE Psychoanalytic Center.

Jon K. Meyer, past president, American Psychoanalytic Association; Professor of Psychiatry and Psychoanalysis, Emeritus, The Medical College of Wisconsin; Clinical Professor of Psychiatry, University of Maryland and Georgetown University Schools of Medicine; Training and Supervising Analyst, Washington Center for Psychoanalysis; past Erik Erikson Scholar-in-Residence, Austen Riggs Center.
Julie Jaffee Nagel, private practice in psychotherapy and psychoanalysis, Ann Arbor, MI.
Richard B. Simpson, membre habilité, Société psychanalytique de Montreal; editorial board, Psychoanalytic Quarterly and International Journal of Psychoanalysis.
Elisabetta Superchi, child analyst and Associate, Hannah Perkins Center for Child Development.
